title: ‘The Sky’s The Limit’—Crypto Now Braced For A Multi-Trillion Wall Street Earthquake After Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, XRP, Cardano, Dogecoin, Litecoin, Solana, Tron And Polygon Price Boom
author: Billy Bambrough
description: A widely-respected crypto developer has outlined how he sees the blockchain industry growing "very, very rapidly by trillions of dollars" as Wall Street giants converge on blockchain technology...

title: What Is A Crypto Miner And How Does Bitcoin Mining Work?
author: Q.ai - Powering a Personal Wealth Movement
description: Ever wondered about the mechanics behind crypto? Meet crypto mining, the complicated system that runs on hash rates, a race to crack the code and math.

title: Multichain, Missing $120 Million Of Cryptocurrencies And Its CEO, Pulls The Plug
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: Locked down exchange hacked. Missing founder holds keys to restarting buggy program.

title: Beware Of Flatcoins, Crypto’s Inflation Busting Fad
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: These coins are designed to protect stablecoin holders from inflation. But they are complicated and it’s not clear whether they will actually work.

title: Why Do Blockchains Need Oracles?
author: Matthew Mastando
description: 487 trillion dollars of value could be brought onto blockchains. Crypto oracles are the key to bridging the real world with decentralized networks.

title: Web3 Meets AI: A Dynamic Duo Transforming User Experiences
author: Sandy Carter
description: By integrating AI technologies into their platforms, innovative companies aim to provide enhanced user experiences, streamline processes, and deliver cutting-edge solu...

title: ‘Better Tech’—A Legendary Google Billionaire Is Backing A Radical Bitcoin And Ethereum Rival Despite Huge $2 Trillion Crypto Price Crash
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Former Google chief executive and billionaire Eric Schmidt has said chainlink has "better technology" and "scales better" than other cryptocurrencies like bitcoin and ethereum...

title: Apple, Google, Amazon, And Tesla Stock Prices Are Now Available To DeFi And Other Crypto Platforms
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: The Pyth network, a decentralized oracle that brings financial data across asset classes on-chain–is working to bring institutional grade price feeds to the world of crypto.

title: Why Is Crypto Crashing? The FTX Saga Explained
author: Q.ai - Powering a Personal Wealth Movement
description: After announcing a rescue acquisition of FTX, Binance has pulled out of the deal citing concerns about their business practices and ongoing investigations from US regulators.

title: Mastercard Is Bringing Crypto Trading To Your Bank

description: The program will see Mastercard act as a middleman between banks and crypto trading platform Paxos.

title: Will Coinbase Survive Amid The Crypto Chaos?
author: Q.ai - Powering a Personal Wealth Movement
description: Coinbase is suspending their affiliate program in a bid to cut costs, which has been labeled by some market commentators as a "big red flag."

title: Can Ethereum And Dogecoin Survive A Global Recession?

description: Ethereum has been trending as well, as the long awaited ‘merge’ and move to proof-of-stake has finally happened.

title: Crypto.com Lays Off More Of It’s Workforce As Crypto Winter Deepens

description: Crypto faces not only an economic downturn but a lack of trust in the sector altogether.

title: Amid Collapse Of Signature, Silicon Valley Bank, Stablecoins Appear To Be Weathering The Storm (For Now)
author: Kamran Rosen
description: With the business world rocked by the recent closures of Silicon Valley Bank and Signature Bank, the crypto world is left trying to determine how stable stablecoins really are.

title: BlockFi Bankruptcy In The Latest FTX Casualty
author: Q.ai - Powering a Personal Wealth Movement
description: Crypto platform BlockFi has filed for Chapter 11 Bankruptcy in New Jersey, citing exposure to FTX as a major factor in their collapse.

title: Chainlink, Tezos Rally As Ropsten Merge Fails To Lift Ether
author: Omkar Godbole
description: Decentralized oracle network Chainlink's LINK token and open-source blockchain Tezos' XTZ coin traded higher, shrugging off the lackluster action in major cryptocurrencies.

title: Binance To Acquire FTX In Emergency Bailout
author: Q.ai - Powering a Personal Wealth Movement
description: After days of swirling rumors about a liquidity crisis at FTX, Binance has stepped in at the last minute to acquire the company and save it from collapse.
